page.title: 19AN OAP'S DAY
page.content: I collect my pension on Thursday.On that day I got up at 6.30 a.m.For breakfast I had fruit juice,boiled egg,B and B cereal,toast,marmalade and coffee.I don't have the T.V. on but I do listen to the radio.The news was on. After getting my pension I went shopping and had a light lunch.Then I read the daily Telegraph and the Daily Mail.I don't have any hobbies,only the wife!I mostly read and watch T.V. if its worth watching.I had a suprise visit from relatives in Suffolk in the evening.I went to bed at 11.45p.m. Sunday is different;it is a relaxing day.Even as a pensioner you can have a different day on Sunday.
